price: Ẹnikẹ́ni tí ó bá gbúnrí kúrò níbi ìrántí Àjọké-ayé, A máa yan èṣù kan fún un. Òun sì ni alábàárìn rẹ̀.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡشُ عَن ذِكۡرِ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ نُقَيِّضۡ لَهُۥ شَيۡطَٰنٗا فَهُوَ لَهُۥ قَرِينٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿshu ʿan dhik'ri al-raḥmāni nuqayyiḍ lahu shayṭānan fahuwa lahu qarīnun
